mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tbl_cb.* from tbl_cb where c_code = #{c_code} order by cb_regdate desc) where rn between 1 and 4
select * from (select rownum rn, tbl_cb.* from tbl_cb where c_code = #{c_code} order by cb_regdate desc) where rn between (#{pageStart}+1) and (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cb(cb_no, c_code, id, cb_title, cb_regdate, cb_content) values (seq_cbno.nextval, #{c_code}, #{id}, #{cb_title}, sysdate, #{cb_content})
mapper.update: update tbl_cb set cb_title = #{cb_title}, cb_content = #{cb_content} where cb_no = #{cb_no}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cb where id = #{id} and c_code = #{c_code}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_cb where c_code = #{c_code}
